CustomField.formula:
IF(ISBLANK(Apttus_Config2__EndDate__c), "",
IF(Date_Format_Type__c = "DateTypeUS",
TEXT(MONTH(Apttus_Config2__EndDate__c)) & "-" & TEXT(DAY(Apttus_Config2__EndDate__c)) & "-" & TEXT(YEAR(Apttus_Config2__EndDate__c)),
TEXT(DAY(Apttus_Config2__EndDate__c)) & "-" & TEXT(MONTH(Apttus_Config2__EndDate__c)) & "-" & TEXT(YEAR(Apttus_Config2__EndDate__c))
))
CustomField.label: Formatted End Date
